Generation IX.Scarlet: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.
Generation IX.Violet: Veluza has excellent regenerative capabilities. It sheds spare flesh from its body to boost its agility, then charges at its prey.

Generation IX.Scarlet: East Province: Area One West Province: West Paldean Sea North Province: North Paldean Sea , Casseroya Lake , Socarrat Trail North Province: Glaseado Mountain ( Normal Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
Generation IX.Violet: East Province: Area One West Province: West Paldean Sea North Province: North Paldean Sea , Casseroya Lake , Socarrat Trail North Province: Glaseado Mountain ( Normal Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
